description: This table stores appointments scheduled for a recommendation.

columns.name: FINDING_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the finding record corresponding to this result.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: APPT_LINK_MTHD_C_NAME
columns.description:
The method category ID for the method used to create the link between the recommendation and the appointment. A null value indicates that the link was created manually.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Manual


Automatic
